title: Orumurai Piranthen Lyrics Nenjirukkum Varai
stanzas:
Orumurai piranthaen
orumurai piranthaen
unakena uyiraiyum
naan koduppaen.

manadhinil unnai
sumappadhinaale
maranaththai thaandi
vaazhndhiruppen

en kannil unai vaithae
kaatchigalai paarpen.
oru nimidam unai marakka
muyandrathile thottren.

neeye en idhayamadi
neeye en jeevanadi.

undhan netri meedhile
thuli varvai varalaagumaa
chinna thaaga neeyumthaan
manam thaangumaa

un kannile thuli neeraiyum
nee sindhavum vidamaatten.
un nizhalaiyum tharai meedhile
nadamaadavum vidamaatten

orey udal orey uyir
orey manam
ninaikkaiyil inikkirathe

neeye en idhayamadi
neeye en jeevanadi.

kaatru veesum maalaiyil
kadarkaraiyil nadai podanum
... paimaram padageri
dhisai maaranum.

oli veesidum iru kangalthaan
vazhi kaattidum kalangaiyaa
karai saeravae manam illaiye
ena thondrinaal adhu pizhaiyaa

nenjukulle unnai vaithu
poottivittu saaviyai
tholaithu vitten.

neeye en idhayamadaa
neeye en jeevanadaa

Orumurai piranthaen
orumurai piranthaen
unakena uyiraiyum
naan koduppaen.

manadhinil unnai
sumappadhinaale
maranaththai thaandi
vaazhndhiruppen

en kannil unai vaithae
kaatchigalai paarpen.
oru nimidam unai marakka
muyandrathile thottren.

neeye en idhayamadaa
neeye en jeevanadaa
